forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. Southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds with a gentle embrace of clouds, a reminder of the coastal fog that lingers. The temperature hovers around a comfortable 53 degrees, accompanied by a light southwest breeze that whispers through the streets. As the day progresses, the sun will emerge, painting the sky with patches of blue and warming the air towards a high of 63 degrees. The shifting winds will rise, bringing a spirited dance, occasionally gusting up to 23 mph, which may add a refreshing chill to the scene.

While the clarity of the day is yet to be fully realized, early indications suggest a horizon softened by residual mist, hinting at the marine layer’s presence. This atmosphere speaks to a serene morning where layers are key; consider donning a light sweater or jacket to counter the cool air, becoming part of the rhythm of the city as you move between sun-dappled sidewalks and breezy corners. Given these inviting conditions, a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a quiet moment spent at a local café, savoring a warm drink, would be a delightful way to experience the charm of San Francisco.
